title: Create Metadata for MiriCanvas
original_prompt:
I want you to respond only in language English.
I want you to act as a very proficient marketing. 

Your task :
Analyze the text I give you and report to me. 
Create a new name that is between 90 - 100 characters long and is SEO friendly.
create the 25 most relevant Keyword separate with comma.


Example Result:

Element Name:
a tulip of flowers sitting on top of a white table

Keyword:
flower,floral,nature,spring,tulip,blossom,summer,background,garden,beautiful,isolated,leaf,bloom,illustration,plant,petal,pink,green,natural,bouquet,romantic,beauty,botanical,design,flora


All output shall be in English. 


this text to Analyze: {Image Name: circle empty blank flat stage mockup}
input1: Image Name: modern minimalist empty room with wooden floor and white walls for product display
input2: Image Name: elegant circular podium with soft lighting for showcasing luxury items in a studio setting
input1_ans:
Element Name:  
a modern minimalist empty room featuring wooden flooring and white walls ideal for product display

Keyword:  
modern,minimalist,empty room,product display,wooden floor,white walls,interior design,showroom,space,clean,contemporary,decor,lighting,versatile,background,studio,home decor,visual merchandising,product photography,design,architecture,interior styling,blank canvas,open space,neutral colors
input2_ans:
Element Name:  
elegant circular podium with soft lighting for showcasing luxury items in a modern studio environment

Keyword:  
elegant, circular, podium, soft lighting, luxury items, studio setting, showcase, display, modern, environment, flat stage, product presentation, interior design, minimalist, photography, backdrop, high-end, retail, ambiance, visual merchandising, artistic, premium, contemporary, spotlight, exhibition
